thread.title: Police: 14-year-old boy shot to death in Austin
thread.title_full: Police: 14-year-old boy shot to death in Austin

author: Jacob Wittich
title: Police: 14-year-old boy shot to death in Austin
text:
Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
A 14-year-old boy was shot to death Saturday afternoon in the Austin neighborhood on the West Side. 
Laquan Allen was shot in the buttocks just after 3 p.m. in the 4900 block of West Hubbard, according to Chicago Police and the Cook County medical examinerâ€™s office. Details on the circumstances of the shooting were not immediately available. 
Allen was taken to Mount Sinai Hospital, where he was pronounced dead at 3:34 p.m., according to authorities. He lived in the West Humboldt Park neighborhood. 
Area North detectives were investigating.
